author: Randy Fasnacht
comment: The game is very hard to play on Moto360. The rotation of the game is side ways so you have to tilt your head in an odd position to play it. Round face seems to cut off some of the game.

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Randy. We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. We have tested it for Moto 360 and its working fine now. Please update the game and try again. Thank you for your feedback

title: Moto 360 rotation is wrong

author: Jawad Ashraf
comment: Love the game. Now got em all. More free games tho please.
title: More please!

author: Brion Fallon
comment: Very poor touch response on moto 360

reply.author: Teensy Studios
reply.content: Hello Brion, We apologize for the inconvenience caused in this regard. We have tested it for Moto 360 and its working fine. Please update the game and try again. If the problem persists, please let us know at feedback@teensystudios.com with screenshots. Thank you for your feedback
